page.title: 14Quincentenial Celebrations
page.content: {Llandovery}was granted a{Charter}by {Richard 3rd}in{1485.}The Royal Charter defined the boundaries of the Borough and brought to the townspeople certain priveleges. During 1985 many{exhibitions and {events}have taken place including a Medieval Fayre week in August (see page 15).The year began in January with a{commemorative ceremony. } In the Spring a{Fun Run}was organised where 500 men, women and children ran a five mile course, each receiving a medal on completion. There was a{Balloon Fayre}with 24 hot-air balloons. Other events included an{art {competition; car -rally;}and {photographic, local history, coin, {Great Western Railway exhibitions. Each child under 12 years old recieved a{commemorative mug.
